target_labels.name: Fairness
target_labels.desc: wanting to see individuals or groups treated equally or equitably

target_labels.name: Loyalty
target_labels.desc: wanting unity and seeing people keep promises or obligations to an in-group

target_labels.name: Authority
target_labels.desc: wanting to respect social roles, duties, privacy, peace, and order

target_labels.name: Sanctity
target_labels.desc: wanting to live in a way that is clean, pure, and holy

目标道德观：
- Care (wanting someone or something to be safe, healthy, and happy)
- Fairness (wanting to see individuals or groups treated equally or equitably)
- Loyalty (wanting unity and seeing people keep promises or obligations to an in-group)
- Authority (wanting to respect social roles, duties, privacy, peace, and order)
- Sanctity (wanting to live in a way that is clean, pure, and holy)
